beer.name: Autumn Ale
beer.description: Breckenridge Brewery's fall seasonal combines the malty goodness of a German lager with the clean crispness of an American ale. Brewed with Munich malts and a delicate blend of Bavarian hops, our Autumn Ale is a full-bodied treat with a nutty-sweet middle, a warming alcohol level and notes of toasted grains. A pre-winter winner.
beer.grains: Two Row Pale, Munich, Roasted Barley, Chocolate
Two Row Pale, Munich, Roasted Barley, Chocolate
